strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION:
Browse your favorite show/series from hulu.com.
See shows like Burn Notice, Prison Break, Heroes, It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia, Family Guy, The Office, The Simpsons, American Dad, Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles, Firefly, Psych, Nip/Tuck, Babylon 5, Eureka and many others and keep track of them from your desktop.
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
Hulu Series ©2008 Benjamin Schirmer Browse your favorite show from hulu.com.
This gadget is an inofficial fan gadget and was not created by hulu.com
